CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 以…为基础；立基于；（base的过去式和过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 广泛根据；基础广泛；基础宽泛
基于活动的成本核算；作业成本法
知识基系统；知识型系统
以数码为基础的；数字基础的
以公开为基础的理事会；基于公开的理事会；基础广泛的理事会

bilingual.source: Leveraging the Collective Intelligence to Deliver Experienced Based Search
bilingual.target: 利用“群众的智慧”，建立基于“经验”的搜索

bilingual.source: Jews who practice a religion based on the Old Testament and the Talmud.
bilingual.target: 信仰立基于基督教的旧约全书和犹太法典的犹太教派.

bilingual.source: T-SQL How to build an aggregate table based on max values from a group?
bilingual.target: 问题是如何建立基于最大值从一组汇总表？

bilingual.source: Jews who practice a religion based on the Old Testament and the Talmud .
bilingual.target: 信仰立基于基督教的旧约全书和犹太法典的犹太教派。

bilingual.source: This play is based on the story of Aladdin.
bilingual.target: 这个剧本是基于阿拉丁的故事。

bilingual.source: A lot of today's great inventions are tech-based.
bilingual.target: 许多今天的伟大发明都是基于技术的。

bilingual.source: So are most of the new great inventions tech-based?
bilingual.target: 那么大多数新的伟大发明都是基于技术的吗？

bilingual.source: People have also made films based on Batman and Spider-Man.
bilingual.target: 人们还制作了基于蝙蝠侠和蜘蛛侠的电影。

bilingual.source: I've also booked accommodation based on the budget we made.
bilingual.target: 我也根据我们的预算预订了住宿。

bilingual.source: This play is based on the traditional fairy tale of Cinderella.
bilingual.target: 这个剧本是基于传统的灰姑娘童话故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Based on this play? Based on this play!
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这场戏？因为这一场戏！

yingyinNormal.en: It's a joke. Based on real events.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开玩笑啦，基于真实故事的玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a joke. Based on real events.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开玩笑啦，基于真实故事的玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Are those soy based candles? I don't know. Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是大豆蜡的蜡烛吗？不知道，怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: What's the sauce? Is it meat based? No. Eat now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么酱，是肉酱吗？不是的，快吃吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So, it's based on your life. No, I'm from Omaha.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来这是根据你的经历写的？不，我是来自奥马哈。

yingyinNormal.en: So, does Penny know you based a character on her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮知道你有个角色以她为原型吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And we know this based on the machines that are being placed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是依据被配置的机器估算的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I know I'm not like that. The character was based on you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道我不像她。那个角色的原型是你。

yingyinNormal.en: Although, based on the floor of your bedroom, I'd say it's a thousand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，根据你卧室的地面情况看，应该有1000条。

yingyinNormal.en: But your communication system was based on our guidance system. And sonar is based on bats. You don't see them hanging upside down in a patent attorney's office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你的通讯系统是根据我们的导向系统制造的。声呐也是根据蝙蝠制造的。你也没见他们倒挂在专利律师的办公室里啊。

yingyinNormal.en: So, your whole life will be based on a lie? Have you thought about that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你今后的生活都要建立在谎言之上吗？你考虑过这些吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It is a love based on giving and receiving, as well as having and sharing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是奠基在付出和接受、拥有和分享之上的爱。

yingyinNormal.en: I have a conclusion based on an observation. No, you don't. No, he doesn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过观察我得出了一点结论。不，你没有。不，他没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you're just assigning random numbers to things based on your opinion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你这只是按自己的喜好给东西乱打分罢了。

yingyinNormal.en: What issues? I'm issue-free. And, based on my exhaustive research, so are you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么问题？我可没问题，而且经过我详尽的研究，你也不用担心你的问题了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, based on what I've heard, you two certainly don't qualify for an annulment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从刚才的话听来，两位不符合注销资格。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Acocella, I made plans based on that understanding. I made financial outlays.
yingyinNormal.zh: 安科切拉先生，我已经为此做了规划，我为此已经有经济支出了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wormholes. They're a staple of science fiction, but they're based on real science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虫洞。它们是科幻片的基本特征，但它们都基于真正的科学。

yingyinNormal.en: What's this, we're supposed to solve this based on what? This. This is all we get.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这算什么，我们要根据什么破案？就这个，我们只有这个。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无根据的；无基座的
adj. 基本的；基础的；碱的；含碱的；碱性的
n. 地下室；基岩；基底杂岩；基底

word_family.mean: n. 基；底；基础；据点；基地；基本成分；碱；基极；词根；词基；垒

sense_info_list.en: if one thing is based on another, it uses it or is developed from it

examination_example.sentence: For instance, one of the apps the students are developing suggests movies <highlight>based</highlight> on your mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，学生们正在开发的一款应用程序可以根据你的情绪推荐电影。

examination_example.sentence: Whereas prosecutors should only evaluate a case <highlight>based</highlight> on its merits, they do seem to be influenced by a company's record in CSR.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管检察官应该只根据案件本身的是非曲直来评估案件，他们似乎还是确实会受到企业社会责任记录的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Electronic means of payment may be more efficient than a payments system <highlight>based</highlight> on paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子支付手段可能比基于纸币的支付系统效率更高。

sense_info_list.en: (in compounds) containing something as an important part or feature

examination_example.sentence: But switching to a mainly plant-<highlight>based</highlight> diet wouldn't help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但转向以植物为主的饮食是没有用的。

examination_example.sentence: The Web-<highlight>based</highlight> program allows you to systematically improve your memory and attention skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以网络为主的项目可以系统地提高你的记忆力和注意力。

examination_example.sentence: They could distort the achievement-<highlight>based</highlight> system of peer-review-led research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们会扭曲同行评价主导型研究的、基于成就的体系。

sense_info_list.en: if a person or business is based in a particular place, that is where they live or work, or where the work of the business is done

examination_example.sentence: Many of the aspects of homebuying aren't a consideration for children, said a real estate agent <highlight>based</highlight> in Santa Clarita, Calif.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在加州圣塔克拉利塔工作的一位房地产经纪人说，孩子们不会考虑关于购房的诸多因素。

examination_example.sentence: Younger children should feel like they're choosing their home, said Adam Bailey, a real estate attorney <highlight>based</highlight> in New York.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在纽约工作的一位房地产律师亚当·贝利说，年幼的孩子应该觉得他们是在选择自己的家。

examination_example.sentence: Whenever decisions are <highlight>based</highlight> on masses of data, "you quickly get into a lot of ethical questions," notes chief executive of a Singapore-<highlight>based</highlight> agency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新加坡一家机构的首席执行官指出，每当决策基于大量数据时，“你很快就会陷入许多道德问题。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 地下室；基岩；基底杂岩；基底
adv. 主要地；基本上；从根本上说；大致说来
adj. 基本的；基础的；碱的；含碱的；碱性的
n. 基数；起点；底线；垒线；基线

word_family.mean: n. 基；底；基础；据点；基地；基本成分；碱；基极；词根；词基；垒

sense_info_list.en: if one thing is based on another; it uses it or is developed from it

examination_example.sentence: It's an enduring responsibility <highlight>based</highlight> on the socialized gender role of women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种基于女性社会化性别角色的永久性义务。

examination_example.sentence: The 3-minute prepared speech and a 2-minute impromptu speech <highlight>based</highlight> on the topic assigned right after the prepared speech.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 3分钟的准备演讲和2分钟的即兴演讲，即兴演讲的主题是准备演讲之后立即分配的。

examination_example.sentence: The claim was <highlight>based</highlight> on a new review of studies about the effects of running.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一说法是基于一项新的关于跑步影响的研究综述。

sense_info_list.en: containing something as an important part or feature

examination_example.sentence: Takotna has gained a reputation for its dessert-<highlight>based</highlight> hospitality since the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自20世纪70年代以来，Takotna就因其以甜点为主的好客而闻名。

examination_example.sentence: It is still the polar opposite of the healthy, mostly plant <highlight>based</highlight> diet that just about every expert says we should be eating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这仍然与几乎每个专家都说我们应该吃健康的植物性饮食完全相反。

examination_example.sentence: But that potential pales beside the never-ending demand for crop-<highlight>based</highlight> fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这种潜力与对农作物燃料永无止境的需求相比相形见绌。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The invention of barcodes (条形码) is <highlight>based</highlight> on a very simple idea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 条形码的发明基于一个非常简单的想法。

examination_example.sentence: In my opinion, freedom is <highlight>based</highlight> on good rules, so students should obey school rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，自由是基于良好的规则，因此学生应遵守学校规则。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Based</highlight> on Lin’s hobby history, his dad had doubts, but he agreed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于林过往的爱好，他的父亲深表怀疑，但他还是同意了。
